notesStmt.note: Eli῾ezer Rovigo: inscribed, folio 1r, 2r.Folio 170v: 'Si concede questo officio uulgaro a' M' Leon di Ruuigo heb per me F Luigi sine che uenga la risuletiona da Roma se li officii delli hebrei siano proibiti come li uulgari de christiani.'Folio 170r: '1555 die x. decembris Reuisus per D. Jacobum Geraldini commiss[arium] apostolicum. Ceasar Belliossus curiae apostol. Bononiensis et dicti D. commiss[arii] not[arius] jurid.'
Manuscript description based on Margoliouth, G.: Catalogue of the Hebrew and Samaritan Manuscripts in the British Museum, London 1965.

msContents.summary: A daily prayer book in an Italian translation in Hebrew characters.

collation.p: Quires of mostly 8 or 10 leaves each (one quire, folios 95-100, has only 6 leaves).

scriptDesc.scriptNote: Ashkenazi/Italian square script of the 15th century. Punctuated.

binding.p: Post-1600. Brown leather. Gold and blind tooled. Spine: 'Machzor. Italian. Hebrew Character. Brit. Mus. Oriental 74.'

history.provenance: Acquisition: M. Aschkenazi of Tunis: purchased by the British Museum on 22 April 1868: inscribed, [171v].
